contact.invite: If you are interested in collaborating, please feel free to contact me:

intro.p1: A Computer Science student specializing in machine learning, with a focus on time-series forecasting and computer vision.
intro.p2: A self-motivated lifelong learner who loves exploring and applying cutting-edge technologies and knowledge.

skills.note: The quantitative display of these skill bars is subjective. This portfolio is written in Vue.js. The corresponding skill bar of vue.js is 30% can serve as a reference standard.

entries.gradeText: All A* in my A-level courses, which took me only 7 months to achieve, placing me in the

entries.firstYearUnit: First Year Team Project | Mathematical Techniques for Computer Science | Data Science | Introduction to Programming
entries.secondYearUnit: Logic and Modelling | Machine Learning | Introduction to Visual Computing | Introduction to Finance
entries.thirdYearUnit: Third Year Project | Advanced Computer Graphics | Organisations and Employment | Mathematical Topics in Machine Learning | Mathematical Systems & Computation | Computer Vision | Managing Finance for Computer Scientists
entries.noteText: I started my undergraduate journey with almost 0 knowledge of computer science—I didn’t even know how to print “Hello, World.” After three years of hard work, I graduated with a First-Class Honours degree and a strong theoretical foundation in computer science.
